affect ( "c_point", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "KAM12" );

	task ( "1st_line" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam12/guard03/01doctor.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM12_001" );
	}

	dowait ( "1st_line" );

	task ( "two" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/sestrogor/kam12/01no.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM12_002" );
	}

	dowait ( "two" );

	task ( "three" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam12/guard03/02lies.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM12_003" );
	}

	dowait ( "three" );

	task ( "four" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam12/guard04/01yessir.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM12_004" );
	}

	dowait ( "four" );
}
